SAIYA_Defend.NAME: Block
SAIYA_Defend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Ki-Enhanced( !M! ): Gain an extra 2 Block.

EnergyBlast.NAME: Energy Blast
EnergyBlast.DESCRIPTION: Starter. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Ki-Enhanced( !M! ) deal 2 more damage.

SoulSpice.NAME: Soul Spice
SoulSpice.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you exhaust a Status card gain !M! Strength.

TransfigurationBeam.NAME: Chocolate Beam
TransfigurationBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills a non-minion enemy, get a random potion. NL Exhaust.
TransfigurationBeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills a non-minion enemy, get a random potion.

Planning.NAME: Planning
Planning.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Ki. NL Put a Starter or Follow-up from your draw pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
Planning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Ki. NL Put a Starter or Follow-up from your draw pile into your hand.

MindBoom.NAME: Mind Boom
MindBoom.DESCRIPTION: Apply !Saiyan:Misc! Concussion then double the target's Concussion. NL Exhaust.
MindBoom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !Saiyan:Misc! Concussion then triple the target's Concussion.  NL Exhaust.

Saiyan:TheBomb.NAME: The Bomb
Saiyan:TheBomb.DESCRIPTION: At the end of 3 turns, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies and increase the damage of this card by !Saiyan:Misc!. NL Exhaust

PowerUp.NAME: Power Up
PowerUp.DESCRIPTION: Follow-up. NL Yell REALLY loud in order to gain !M! Ki and !B! block.

Rekindle.NAME: Rekindle
Rekindle.DESCRIPTION: Increase your Ki-regen by 50%. NL Exhaust.

PressOn.NAME: Press On
PressOn.DESCRIPTION: This turn when playing a card with a Ki cost, ignore it and add a Ki Burn into your discard instead. NL Exhaust
PressOn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn when playing a card with a Ki cost, ignore it and add a Ki Burn into your discard instead.

PowerStance.NAME: Power Stance
PowerStance.DESCRIPTION: ALL your Attack cards are now also Starter.
PowerStance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL ALL your Attack cards are now also Starter.

Afterimage.NAME: Afterimage
Afterimage.DESCRIPTION: Follow-up. NL Gain 1 Buffer, put !M! Daze on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

HyperTimeChamber.NAME: The Time Chamber
HyperTimeChamber.DESCRIPTION: Enemies become Stopped for 2 turns. NL You are Training for 2 turns.

Training.NAME: Training
Training.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL You are Training for !M! turns. NL Exhausts when finished training, cannot be manually discarded or exhausted.
Training.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Can't play cards that target enemies while in training.

SpiritSword.NAME: Spirit Sword
SpiritSword.DESCRIPTION: Consume !Saiyan:KiReq! Ki. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Finisher: Deal !D! x Combo damage to the enemy behind.

Furor.NAME: Defiance
Furor.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength every time an enemy gains a buff.
Furor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and !Saiyan:KiVar! Ki every time an enemy gains a buff.

Overexert.NAME: Overexert
Overexert.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and !Saiyan:KiVar! Ki. Shuffle 2 Ki_Burns into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

KiBurn.NAME: Ki Burn
KiBurn.DESCRIPTION: Consumes !M! Ki when drawn. NL Ethereal.

DragonFist.NAME: Dragon Fist
DragonFist.DESCRIPTION: Follow-up. NL Deal !D! damage. Exhaust a card. NL Shuffle a Ki_Burn into your discard pile.
DragonFist.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Follow-up. NL Deal !D! damage. Exhaust a card.

Honing.NAME: Honing
Honing.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! card and gain Ki-Regen equal to 1 + double its cost. NL Exhaust.
Honing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! cards and gain Ki-Regen equal to 2 + double their cost.

KameHameHa.NAME: Kame Hame Ha
KameHameHa.DESCRIPTION: Consume !Saiyan:KiReq! Ki. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Finisher: Costs 1 less energy per Combo stack.

PowerPole.NAME: Power Pole
PowerPole.DESCRIPTION: Damage ALL enemies, dealing !D! to the closest one, and doubling the damage for each one after that.

SuperSaiyanThree.NAME: Super Saiyan 3
SuperSaiyanThree.DESCRIPTION: Gain !Saiyan:KiVar! Ki and Ki-regen. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Lose them gradually over !Saiyan:Misc! turns.

MajinSeal.NAME: Majin Seal
MajinSeal.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Ki-regen. Every time you gain Combo gain another Combo. NL Randomize the target of the 1st attack you play each turn.

CCCapsule.NAME: C.C. Capsule
CCCapsule.DESCRIPTION: Get a random Power, it costs 1 less Energy until played. NL Exhaust.

Momentum.NAME: Momentum
Momentum.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use a Finisher, only consume half of your Combo.
Momentum.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you use a Finisher, only consume half of your Combo.

ReverberatingForce.NAME: Reverb Strike
ReverberatingForce.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL At the end of your next turn deal !D! damage. NL Finisher: Increase next turn damage by !D! x Combo.

KiStrike.NAME: Ki Strike
KiStrike.DESCRIPTION: Starter. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

KaioKen.NAME: KaioKen
KaioKen.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Ki, apply 1 Vulnerable to yourself. NL Exhaust.
KaioKen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Ki, apply 1 Vulnerable to yourself.

Endure.NAME: Endure
Endure.DESCRIPTION: Consume ALL your Ki, gain that much block (currently !B!).

BackAttack.NAME: Back Attack
BackAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Telegraphed. NL Finisher: Apply Weak equal to your Combo.

ExtremeSpeed.NAME: Extreme-speed
ExtremeSpeed.DESCRIPTION: All your Finisher cards now also trigger: NL Finisher: Draw Combo/2 cards (round down)
ExtremeSpeed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: All your Finisher cards now also trigger: NL Finisher: Draw 1+ Combo/2 cards (round down)

LastResort.NAME: Last Resort
LastResort.DESCRIPTION: Consume ALL your Ki, gain 1 Strength for every !M! Ki consumed. NL Lose ALL Ki Regen. NL Exhaust.

Quickening.NAME: Quickening
Quickening.DESCRIPTION: Starter. NL Consume !Saiyan:KiReq! Ki. NL Gain 2 Plated Armor, apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
Quickening.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Starter. NL Consumes !Saiyan:KiReq! Ki. NL Gain 3 Plated Armor, apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

MonkeyTail.NAME: Monkey Tail
MonkeyTail.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Put a Full Moon and a Great_Ape Form in your draw pile.

FullMoon.NAME: Full Moon
FullMoon.DESCRIPTION: The moon looms ominously in the sky.

GreatApeForm.NAME: Great Ape Form
GreatApeForm.DESCRIPTION: Moonstruck. Gain [E] [E]  at the start of every turn. Exhaust ALL your non-attack cards. Become a Great_Ape.

ConcussiveBlow.NAME: Concussive Blow
ConcussiveBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Concussion to the target.

DragonRadar.NAME: Dragon Radar
DragonRadar.DESCRIPTION: Put 7 Dragon Balls in your deck, split between your draw and discard piles. NL Exhaust.

DragonBall.NAME: Dragon Ball
DragonBall.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Play 7 to grant a powerful wish.

Makankosappo.NAME: Makankosappo
Makankosappo.DESCRIPTION: Consume !Saiyan:KiReq! Ki. NL Deal !D! damage !Saiyan:Misc! times. NL Finisher: Apply concussion equal to your combo.

Kienzan.NAME: Kien-zan
Kienzan.DESCRIPTION: Consume !Saiyan:KiReq! Ki. NL Deal !D! damage. This attack ignores block.

DoubleMasenko.NAME: Double Masenko
DoubleMasenko.DESCRIPTION: Consume !Saiyan:KiReq! Ki. NL Deal !D! damage to two different random enemies.

BurningSoul.NAME: Burning Soul
BurningSoul.DESCRIPTION: Consume up to !M! Ki at the end of every turn, gain that much Ki-Barrier.

Scouter.NAME: Scouter
Scouter.DESCRIPTION: Consume !Saiyan:KiReq! Ki. NL Gain !B! block this and next turn. NL If the enemy is NOT attacking gain an extra !M! block.

Flurry.NAME: Flurry
Flurry.DESCRIPTION: Follow-up. NL Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Ki-Enhanced( !M! ): hit 1 additional time.

ThirstForFight.NAME: Thirst for Battle
ThirstForFight.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength for every buff on a target enemy. NL Exhaust.
ThirstForFight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength for every buff on a target enemy.

Teleport.NAME: Instant Transfer
Teleport.DESCRIPTION: Starter & Follow-up. NL Consumes !Saiyan:KiReq! Ki. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

DrainingStrike.NAME: Draining Force
DrainingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain [E]  for each enemy hit with unblocked damage. NL Exhaust.
DrainingStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain [E]  for each enemy hit. NL Exhaust.

Taunt.NAME: Taunt
Taunt.DESCRIPTION: Give an enemy !M! Strength, gain 2 Reflect.

KiExplosion.NAME: Ki Explosion
KiExplosion.DESCRIPTION: Follow-up. NL Consumes !Saiyan:KiReq! Ki. NL Gain !B! block and !M! Ki-Barrier.

RuthlessBlow.NAME: Ruthless Blow
RuthlessBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Finisher: Apply Vulnerable equal to your Combo.

SolarFlare.NAME: Solar Flare
SolarFlare.DESCRIPTION: Consume !Saiyan:KiReq! Ki. NL Stun an enemy for 1 turn.
SolarFlare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Consumes !Saiyan:KiReq! Ki. NL Stun ALL enemies for 1 turn.

SenzuBean.NAME: Senzu Bean
SenzuBean.DESCRIPTION: Give a non-minion enemy Redemption: Strength( !M! ), Invincible (33% Max HP). NL Obtain a random common relic at end of combat.
SenzuBean.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Give a non-minion enemy Redemption: Strength( !M! ), Metallicize( !M! x3 ). NL Obtain a random common relic at end of combat.

GenkiDama.NAME: Genki Dama
GenkiDama.DESCRIPTION: Consume up to !M! Ki and deal that much damage to ALL enemies (currently !D! ). NL Gain !Saiyan:Misc! Weak.
